exercises.description: Apply Data Access Layer to solve a real-world problem

learning_objectives: Understand the fundamentals of Data Access Layer
Apply Data Access Layer in practical scenarios
Implement solutions using Data Access Layer
sections.background: A layer of software that provides data exchange functions on top of the database. Its function is mainly to realize the persistent storage of application data, that is, write data into the database, and read data from the database and pass it to the application to realize data exchange.

metadata.concept_definition: A layer of software that provides data exchange functions on top of the database. Its function is mainly to realize the persistent storage of application data, that is, write data into the database, and read data from the database and pass it to the application to realize data exchange.
